item.title: RT by @cathynewman: incredible anyone has to say this but sneering at a working class female Labour MP for going to the opera is not a brilliant look
item.dc:creator: @PickardJE
item.description: incredible anyone has to say this but sneering at a working class female Labour MP for going to the opera is not a brilliant look

item.title:
RT by @cathynewman: Rayner responds to Raab:
‚ÄúMy advice to the deputy prime minister is to cut out the snobbery & brush up on his opera. The Marriage of Figaro is the story of a working-class woman who gets the better of a privileged but dim-witted villain.‚Äù
item.dc:creator: @PickardJE

item.title: RT by @cathynewman: ‚ÄúShe walked everywhere. She put her party shoes in a bag and donned her trainers. She walked. Zara believed that a woman should be able to walk home‚Ä¶She was in the heart of her community, ten minutes from home. 'We all need to be talking about what happened to OUR ZARA‚Äù

item.dc:creator: @Channel4News
item.description:
"Are you scared of Putin?"
"Me? No. Why? Why should I be scared of Putin?"

@cathynewman talks to Russia's ambassador to the UK Andrei Kelin, and asks if he was informed about Putin's plan to invade Ukraine.

item.title:
RT by @cathynewman: Tory MP Danny Kruger says he doesn‚Äôt agree ‚Äúthat women have an absolute right to bodily autonomy‚Äù on abortion.
He says he doesn‚Äôt believe we should lecture the United States on this ‚Äúpolitical‚Äù decision.

He says he doesn‚Äôt believe we should lecture the United States on this ‚Äúpolitical‚Äù decision.

item.title:
RT by @cathynewman: "Shout out to your prime minister, Mr Boris Johnson. This gentleman is a really a huge help to us."
Ahead of their Glastonbury appearance Eurovision winners Kalush speak to @CathyNewman about their favourite Brit - Boris Johnson.

item.title: RT by @cathynewman: I heard the news that American women have lost the right to abortion as part of healthcare while reporting the #AfghanistanEarthquake. Here men initially refused to allow ‚Äòtheir‚Äô women be treated for broken bones because they shouldn‚Äôt appear in public. Why do they hate us?

item.title: RT by @cathynewman: I watched my mother's life and I knew I wanted better. And I did - thanks to #TitleIX and #Roe. I want my daughters to watch my life and dream even bigger. Not envy that I had access to abortion and they won't.
item.dc:creator: @AnnOlivarius
item.description:
I watched my mother's life and I knew I wanted better. And I did - thanks to #TitleIX and #Roe.
I want my daughters to watch my life and dream even bigger. Not envy that I had access to abortion and they won't.
